FontString.name: JocysCom_Details_FontString
FontString.text: Move mouse over checkbox to see details:

Scripts.OnLoad: self.text:SetText("|cffefc176 START TTS on opening window|r"); self.text:SetPoint("TOPLEFT", 24, -8);
self.text:SetText("|cffefc176 STOP TTS on closing window|r"); self.text:SetPoint("TOPLEFT", 24, -8);
self.text:SetText("|cffefc176 Dialogues, books, mail, etc.|r"); self.text:SetPoint("TOPLEFT", 24, -8);
